issue.title: [Java] [Gandiva] Deploy gandiva snapshot jars automatically
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3385](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3385). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Deploy the packaged gandiva jar to maven snapshot repo from travis. Do this only for commits that modify gandiva.
